summary: CONSUMER STATES THAT WHEN WEATHER IS 32 DEGREES OR LOWER THE BRAKES DO NOT FUNCTION PROPERLY AND REQUIRE EXCESSIVE EFFORT.  THE BRAKE PEDAL WILL NOT DEPRESS AND WILL STICK AT TOP.  IF VEHICLE IS BEING DRIVEN AND BRAKES ARE APPLIED, THE CAR WILL NOT STOP.  THE DEALER HAS ATTEMPTED TO REPAIR 2 TIMES UNSUCCESSFULLY. TS
